1576640.name: Left Alone: Rebirth
1576640.description:
Left Alone is back…but this time it’s been reborn!

Battle the desolate elements of Mount High, crawl through depths of the mysterious surroundings and venture into places you didn't think possible. Left alone: Rebirth is a remake to the popular indie thriller Left Alone!

  • Psychological thriller – Discover clues, lore, notes, and memories left behind by past students and visitors of Mount High Campgrounds. Isolated and completely alone, you must navigate through the dangers that lie ahead.

  • Immersive gameplay - Scavenge the environment to craft items that will aid you in solving puzzles throughout the game. Find clues and uncover traces of your friends’ disappearances—you might unearth more than you bargained for.

  • High-suspense atmosphere - Carefully designed audio cues and 3D soundscapes immerse the player in an environment filled with tension, delivering a hair-raising experience.

  • Stunning vistas - Explore multiple interior and exterior environments, including wild hiking trails, neglected cabins, towering rocky ravines, desolate campgrounds, an abandoned school, and much more.

The World:

Built from the ground up, Left Alone: Rebirth is bigger and better than the original, retaining and improving on everything you loved about the first game. Experience its unique, high-octane atmosphere and incredible, immersive environments, now with 10 times the detail and fidelity—for those who dare to play. The game also includes numerous quality-of-life improvements across all its systems.

The Story:

Begin an adventure you'll never forget as you step into the role of ex-military officer Joel Dent, recovering from a long and gruelling period of physical trauma. Now on the mend, Joel and his friends plan a weekend getaway in the bleak Canadian forests, revisiting the nostalgic Mount High Camp for a fun and adventurous fishing trip. However, much has changed since they first met at school 22 years ago.

Strange occurrences soon leave Joel isolated and alone, with limited supplies. He must rely on his extensive experience to survive while searching for clues about his friends' sudden disappearance. His journey leads him to an abandoned school shrouded in a horrific past. As Joel delves deeper, he uncovers horrors beyond his worst nightmares, realizing he was never truly Left Alone.

What To Expect From This Re-imagining:

  • Rework of all major outdoor areas: All with expanded play areas, brand new redesign of forest location. A lot more things to find, discover and visit.

  • New models, textures, lighting, and environmental effects: I will introduce new PBR terrain and in-game models to make the environments feel more believable and up to date with modern techniques, brand new higher resolution textures and lighting. New custom post-processing and VFX due to an upgrade in the engine.

  • Brand new never before seen areas: I intend to add never before seen areas, locations to add more story related elements and immersive moments.

  • Brand new story elements: I will be adding new puzzles, notes, lore and important sources of information for your journey and may have some secrets in store too! 

  • Brand new character controller: The new controller will have added fluidity to camera movement to make it feel more immersive when traversing and also include new sound effects for all underfoot surfaces.

  • New Inventory system and interactive puzzles: The game will feature a brand new inventory system which allow you to pick-up more items, which can be examined, used and combined for gameplay purposes.

  • Improvements to the flashlight system: The old flashlight system was a drag, so this will be updated to be more efficient, less of a crutch but also beautified to make it more appealing for usage.

  • Improved note system and phone system: All notes will be re-written and new content will be added to add more story, background and information. All notes will be collectable and can be re-read after leaving a particular location.

  • Adding new clues for puzzles and tough areas: this is to improve flow and reduce player frustration from feedback I have received over the years.

  • Full controller support for all controller types

  • New graphics options and menus across the entire game

  • Improvements to the core save system

  • Steam achievements

  • Full re-write of the game code for efficiency and better performance
